data.imageGalleryOpened: A boolean value to determine if the image gallery is opened or closed.
data.imageGalleryActiveUrl: The src URL of the image that is currently active.
data.imageGalleryImageIndex: When the image gallery is initialized we'll add an data-index incrementor (1, 2, 3, ... etc.) to all the images in the gallery.
data.imageGalleryOpen(event): The method that can be called to open the image gallery.
data.imageGalleryClose(): The method that can be called to close the image gallery.
data.imageGalleryNext(): The method that will be called to load the next image in the gallery.
data.imageGalleryPrev(): The method that will be called to load the previous image in the gallery.

alert_notification.title: Add or remove images
alert_notification.description: Simply add or remove your own <li><img src='...' /></li> elements to the image gallery, and it will automatically be reflected in the gallery.
